title: Goodnight Moon
short_plot_summary: A young rabbit says goodnight to everything around in their room and outside the window before falling asleep.
explanation: A moon, representing the nighttime setting of the story
A rabbit, representing the main character, the young rabbit
A bed, symbolizing the young rabbit's bedroom where the story takes place
A picture frame, illustrating the various objects and images in the room that the rabbit says goodnight to
A star, signifying the stars outside the window that the young rabbit also says goodnight to
